sentences.en: Acidity in soil can be neutralized by spreading lime on it.
sentences.cn: 土壤的酸性可以通过在它上面撒石灰来中和.

sentences.en: Add a few drops of lime juice.
I'll have a vodka and lime.
sentences.cn: 我要喝一杯酸橙伏特加。

sentences.en: If your soil is very acid, add lime.
sentences.cn: 如果土壤酸性太强，就加些石灰。

sentences.en: Lemon and lime juice were both temporarily out of stock.
sentences.cn: 柠檬汁和酸橙汁暂时都缺货。
许多土壤中都含有石灰.

sentences.en: Lime in the soil is detrimental to some plants.
sentences.cn: 土壤里的石灰对某些植物有害.

sentences.en: Lime preserved in salt is a north African speciality which is used to flavour chicken dishes.
sentences.cn: 盐渍的酸橙是北非的一种特产，在烹制鸡肉时用来调味。

sentences.en: Round about , piles of lime - stone glistened in all the colours of the rainbow.
sentences.cn: 周围一堆堆的石灰石,在彩虹一样的斑斓色彩中闪闪发光.

sentences.en: Serve the dish garnished with wedges of lime.
sentences.cn: 给这道菜配上几角酸橙.

sentences.en: She taught her students something like lime could be obtained by burning limestone.
sentences.cn: 她教学生一些东西，像什么“石灰可以通过焚烧石灰石来获取。”

sentences.en: She wore a lime-green trouser suit.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身暗黄绿色的衣裤套装。

sentences.en: Sophie looked chic in lime green and navy.
sentences.cn: 索菲身着酸橙绿和海军蓝，显得很时尚。

sentences.en: The lime has turned to powder.
The lime water has turned cloudy, therefore carbon dioxide has been produced during the experiment.
sentences.cn: 石灰水变得混浊了, 可见在实验中有二氧化碳生成了.

sentences.en: The wall was first pricked up with a coat lime.
sentences.cn: 墙壁先抹上一层石灰打底子。

sentences.en: These shrubs must have an acid, lime-free soil.
sentences.cn: 这些灌木必须生长在不含石灰的酸性土壤环境。

sentences.en: They broke open the cellar door and sprinkled lime there, and in all the outbuildings.
sentences.cn: 他们打开了地窖门，在那里和所有的外屋里都撒上了石灰。

phrases.tran_cn: 引人注目，成为大家的注意中心
消石灰；熟石灰（等于slaked lime）
灰土；钙质土；石灰质土壤

trans.tran_en: a white substance obtained by burning limestone, used for making cement, marking sports fields etc
to add lime to soil to control acid
